# cgltf - Single-header GLTF 2.0 parser

## Download

Download `cgltf.h` from:
https://github.com/jkuhlmann/cgltf/blob/master/cgltf.h

Place it in this directory (`third_party/cgltf/cgltf.h`).

## Usage

The EaSE viewer and other EDEN projects will automatically detect and use cgltf
if the header is present. No additional build configuration needed.

## License

cgltf is MIT licensed - see the header file for details.
